## ILogger.write() method

Logs a message based on an event that triggered during runtime operations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
write(event: ILogEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | [ILogEvent](./jabra-js.ilogevent.md) | Event that should be logged. Includes message, logging level and message. See [ILogEvent](./jabra-js.ilogevent.md) for more information. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
